statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ 1 \\ 1 \\ 0 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ -4 \\ 2 \\ 0 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 0 \\ 0 \\ 0 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -8 \\ 2 \\ 2 \\ 0 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 22 \\ -12 \\ 0 \\ 0 \\ 8 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 11 \\ -6 \\ 0 \\ 0 \\ 4 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
